Display.Hicbit_Display_Init: Display initialization, please execute at boot time
Sensor.hicbit_SoundSensor: Set the Sound sensor status,1 detect the sound source,0 no detect the sound source 声音
Sensor.hicbit_avoidSensor: Get the obstacle avoidance sensor status,1 detect obstacle,0 no detect obstacle 避障判断
Sensor.hicbit_belt_clearLight: Clear the color of the colored lights and turn off the lights.
Sensor.hicbit_belt_setPixelRGB: Set the color of the colored lights, after finished the setting please perform  the display of colored lights.
Sensor.hicbit_belt_showLight: Display the colored lights, and set the color of the colored lights to match the use. After setting the color of the colored lights, the color of the lights must be displayed.
Sensor.hicbit_collisionsensor: Get the collision sensor status,1 trigger,0 no trigger 碰撞
Sensor.hicbit_getKnobValue: Get the ad value of the knob moudule 旋钮
Sensor.hicbit_getSoundsensorValue: Get the ad value of the Sound sensor moudule 声音AD
Sensor.hicbit_getavoidSensorValue: Get the ad value of the avoid Sensor moudule 避障AD
Sensor.hicbit_getphotosensitiveValue: Get the ad value of the photosensitive moudule 光敏AD
Sensor.hicbit_lineSensorValue: Get the line follower sensor port ad value 巡线
Sensor.hicbit_photosensitiveSensor: Get the Photosensitive sensor status,1 detect bright,0 no detect bright 光敏
Sensor.hicbit_ultrasonic: Get the distance of ultrasonic detection to the obstacle 超声波
hicbit.hicbit_readAngle: Send read hicbit servos angle command
hicbit.hicbit_runActionGroup: Set the servo controller to run a actiongroup
hicbit.hicbit_setFanSpeed: Set the speed of the fan, range of -100~100.
hicbit.hicbit_setMotorSpeed:
Send robot attitude to the servo controller



Set the speed of the number 1 motor and number 2 motor, range of -100~100, that can control the tank to go advance or turn of.
hicbit.onhicbit_getAngle: Do someting when hicbit receive angle
hicbit.onhicbit_getAngle|param|body: code to run when event is raised
hicbit.setServo: Set the angle of servo 1 to 8, range of 0~270 degree
hicbitRGBPixelMode: Different modes for RGB or RGB+W RGBLight QbitRGBColors
